Kate Winslet in Collateral Beauty ?

Actor Kate Winslet is in talks to join the upcoming drama film Collateral Beauty , which stars Will Smith in the lead. Details about Winslet’s role are not known at this time. Apart from Smith, the film stars Helen Mirren, Ed Norton, Michael Pena and Naomie Harris.

Actor Keira Knightley is also in negotiations to join the cast.

The story of the film centres around a New York advertising exec (Smith) who experiences a deep personal tragedy. His colleagues devise a unique plan to break him out of his depression. — IANS
title: Kate Winslet in Collateral Beauty ?
